SEARCH
Package com.game.core.utils

Class Timer<T>

java.lang.Object
com.game.core.utils.Timer<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of object the consumer function processes when executed
public class Timer<T> extends Object
A utility class to manage timer-related functionality, with support for executing a task after a specified time interval and optional repetitive execution.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Timer(double time, Consumer<T> func)
    Constructs a Timer with a specified time interval and a function to execute when the timer ends.
    Timer(double time, Consumer<T> func, boolean isRepetitive)
    Constructs a Timer with a specified time interval, a function to execute, and a flag for repetitive execution.

  • Constructor Details

    • Timer

      public Timer(double time, Consumer<T> func)
      Constructs a Timer with a specified time interval and a function to execute when the timer ends.
      Parameters:
      time - the initial time interval in seconds
      func - the function to execute when the timer ends

    • Timer

      public Timer(double time, Consumer<T> func, boolean isRepetitive)
      Constructs a Timer with a specified time interval, a function to execute, and a flag for repetitive execution.
      Parameters:
      time - the initial time interval in seconds
      func - the function to execute when the timer ends
      isRepetitive - specifies whether the timer should reset and repeat execution upon completion

  • Method Details

    • decreaseTime

      public void decreaseTime(double value)
      Decreases the remaining time of the timer by the specified value.
      Parameters:
      value - the amount of time to subtract from the timer in seconds

    • update

      public void update(double deltaTime, T obj, Runnable func)
      Updates the timer with elapsed time, executing the specified function when the timer ends. For repetitive timers, it resets and starts again.
      Parameters:
      deltaTime - the amount of time elapsed since the last update in seconds
      obj - the object to pass to the consumer function
      func - a runnable to execute if the timer is not repetitive and ends

      public double getTimeLeft()
